fields.Video Description: This poem is written by a noted Indian poet Shiv Mangal Singh "Suman". I have recited it. I have taken his name and credited him in the beginning of the video. This poem talks about the feeling of thankfulness towards different people whom we come across in our lifetime
italki call to action: Get a free Hindi lesson with italki: http://promos.italki.com/wikitongues_hin
Demographics: 258,000,000 in India (2001 census). Population total all countries: 260,333,620. L2 users: 120,000,000 in India (Wiesenfeld 1999).
YouTube License Statement: This video is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International license. To download a copy, please contact hello@wikitongues.org.
fields.Geneaology: "[ Indo-European, Indo-Iranian, Indo-Aryan, Central zone, Western Hindi, Hindustani ]"
